category-def.name: sdt-weaving
category-def.label: JDT Weaving
category-def.description: JDT Weaving for Scala provides the Java Development Tools Weaving service for Eclipse. If you already have it installed (for instance, if you installed AspectJ or Springsource ToolSuite), do *not* install this version.

category-def.name: sdt-source
category-def.label: Scala IDE for Eclipse Source Feature
